official_title: A bill to amend title 18 and title 39 of the United States Code to permit the transportation, mailing and broadcasting of advertising, information, and materials concerning lotteries conducted by nonprofit organizations in accordance with State law.

summary.text: Authorizes the transportation, mailing, and broadcasting of advertising, information, and materials concerning lotteries conducted by nonprofit organizations in accordance with State law.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 and title 39 of the United States Code to permit the transportation, mailing and broadcasting of advertising, information, and materials concerning lotteries conducted by nonprofit organizations in accordance with State law.
